problems.title: Longest Palindromic Substring
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given a string S, find the longest palindromic substring in S.

Return the longest palindromic substring.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
babad

Sample Output
bab

Explanation:
"aba" is also a valid answer.

Sample Input
cbbd

Sample Output
bb
problems.constraints:
1 <= |S| <= 1000
S consists of digits and English letters.
hintsList: Expand around the center for each character.
Consider both odd and even length centers.
